set.name: DMSD-09 Super GR Start Deck: Cap's Orega-Ora Delete

property.name: Type
property.value: Orega Aura

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you attach this to a creature already attached to other auras, this aura costs 2 less to use. ■ The attached creature gets "powered breaker". (A creature that has "powered breaker" break an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ When you attach this to a creature, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block. {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-09 Super GR Start Deck: Cap's Orega-Ora Delete

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If this creature doesn't have an aura attached to it, this creature can't attack. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Type

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top card of your deck or Super Gacharange Zone. You may put it on the bottom of it. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

(A creature that has "powered breaker" breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ When you attach this to a creature, draw 2 cards. {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Rules

If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-09 Super GR Start Deck: Cap's Orega-Ora Delete

property.name: Type
property.value: Orega Aura

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this aura is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you attach this to a creature, untap that creature. ■ The attached creature gets "blocker". (You may tap a creature that has "blocker" to change the attack target of one of your opponent's creatures to that creature.) {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-09 Super GR Start Deck: Cap's Orega-Ora Delete

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

(At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your spells cost 2 less to cast and your aura cost 2 less to use. They can't cost less than 1. TWINPACT ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -5000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 less is destroyed.)
